rows.label: tlk47600165_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Ahh, what lovely weather we're
having... It reminds me of the time
I went inside the Village Guardian.

rows.label: tlk47600165_02_msg0002
rows.name:
When I finally came out of the pitch
darkness into the daylight, it felt as
if I was being reborn...

rows.label: tlk47600165_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Oh yes, that's actually why I left a
bunch of lamps in there, so it would
be easier to find your way around.

rows.label: tlk47600165_02_msg0004
rows.name:
Just be careful in there. If it's looking
hairy, you come straight back out,
you hear?
